bibliography.title: Atmospheric chemistry of pentachloroethane (CCl_3CCl_2H): absorption spectra of CCl_3CCl_2 and CCl_3CCl_2O_2 radicals, kinetics of the CCl_3CCl_2O_2 + NO reaction, and fate of the CCl_3CCl_2O radical
